TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWin32Window

summary.span: 提供來公開 Win32 HWND 控制代碼的介面。

span.span: Provides an interface to expose Win32 HWND handles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個介面會公開 HWND Win32 控制代碼的物件。This interface is implemented on objects that expose Win32 HWND handles. 結果的控制代碼可以搭配 Win32 API 呼叫。The resultant handle can be used with Win32 API calls. ## Examples 下列範例會設定屬性`label1`目前的`Form1`。The following example sets the property of `label1` to the current of `Form1`. 這個範例假設您有呼叫`Form1`與呼叫`label1`在其上。This example assumes that you have a called `Form1` with a called `label1` on it. [!code-cpp[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Handle As IntPtr
public: property IntPtr Handle { IntPtr get(); };

summary.span: 取得以實作器表示的視窗控制代碼。

span.span: Gets the handle to the window represented by the implementer.

value.span: 以實作器表示的視窗的控制代碼。

span.span: A handle to the window represented by the implementer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值實作器，根據屬性無法變更視窗的生命期限內。Depending on the implementer, the value of the property could change during the life of the window. ## Examples 下列範例會設定屬性`label1`目前的`Form1`。The following example sets the property of `label1` to the current of `Form1`. 這個範例假設您有呼叫`Form1`與呼叫`label1`在其上。This example assumes that you have a called `Form1` with a called `label1` on it. [!code-cpp[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
